page.title: 05NEW ROMNEY LOCAL GAMES
page.content: THE CANTERBURY PILGRIMS INTRODUCED THE GAME OF BAT AND TRAP TO KENT.IT IS MOSTLY PLAYED IN PUBS AND IT IS COMPETITIVE EACH PUB BELONGS TO A LEAGUE AND THEY TRY TO WIN A TROPHY.THERE ARE EIGHT MEMBERS IN A TEAM.THEY USE A BOX WITH A FLAP AT THE FRONT A SOLID WOOD OVAL BAT AND A HARD BALL APPROX 6CM IN DIAMETER. THE OBJECT OF THE GAME IS TO BOWL THE BALL AT THE TRAP IF YOU MISS THE TRAP THE BATSMAN HAS TO BAT IT BACK OVER THE BASE LINE BETWEEN THE TWO POSTS. THIS COUNTS AS A RUN YOU CAN BE PUT OUT BY NOT BATTING THE BALL OVER THE BASE LINE OR BY KNOCKING THE BALL OVER THE SIDE LINES . JUMPING THE DYKES IS A POPULAR GAME ON THE MARSH WE LOOK FOR DYKES WITH STEEP SIDES AND JUMP OVER THE DYKE AND TRY NOT TO GET WET.
